name: n8n-nodes-azuresql
description: n8n node to connect and interact with Azure SQL databases with dynamic database selection

scripts.build:
npx rimraf dist && mkdir dist && mkdir dist\credentials && mkdir dist
odes && mkdir dist
odes\Azure && mkdir dist
odes\Azure\Sql && tsc credentials/AzureSql.credentials.ts --outDir dist/credentials --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck --target es2019 --module commonjs && tsc nodes/Azure/Sql/AzureSql.node.ts --outDir dist/nodes/Azure/Sql --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck --target es2019 --module commonjs && tsc nodes/Azure/Sql/GenericFunctions.ts --outDir dist/nodes/Azure/Sql --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck --target es2019 --module commonjs && tsc nodes/Azure/Sql/interfaces.ts --outDir dist/nodes/Azure/Sql --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck --target es2019 --module commonjs && copy nodes\Azure\Sql\AzureSql.node.json dist
odes\Azure\Sql\ && copy nodes\Azure\Sql\azuresql.svg dist
odes\Azure\Sql\
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run lint -c .eslintrc.prepublish.js nodes credentials package.json
